trans-unit.source: Name of this state. Will appear in frontend.
The subgroup is used to allow a grouping of states in the dashboard.
The style setting will be added to the div surrounding the state.
Don't show on dashboard. If checked the state will never appear in the dashboard, even if not excluded in user preferences.
Primary Color will be used for font color and for dashboard.

These actions will be executed when entering this state. Typically there will be only one entry, but there may be multiple entries as well. You may set conditions inside the transition which control if the action will be executed. There are no buttons; execution will be dependent on the previous state.

These actions will be offered to the FE user as buttons. Each entry represents one button that might be visible or not - depending on conditions inside the transition. Usually these buttons control the project flow. Typically there will be a set of buttons available for the FE users.
